title: R/GA: John Hardy 'Moment Maker'
description: The John Hardy 'Moment Maker' project is a web-based procedural flower interface designed for enhancing the user-end shopping experience. Developed in 2024 as part of a contract with R/GA, this interactive tool allows users to create unique floral arrangements that correspond to John Hardy jewelry pieces, providing a personalized and engaging way to explore the brand's collection.
